Home.Bio.Title: Bio
Home.Bio.Content: Everything from a maker to an electrician, a designer to a developer, I'm a jack of all trades but a master of none, oftentimes better than a master of one. Born and raised in Hanoi, Vietnam, I'm currently studying in Mikkeli, Finland. With a passion for creating values, I've always loved learning and making interesting things. Bringing ideas to life has always given me endless satisfaction.
Home.Comfortable.Title: Familiar with
Home.Timeline.Title: My Journey
Home.Timeline.Content.02.Description: Where all hopes and dreams began.
Home.Timeline.Content.14: Wrote my first line of code on my sister's computer
Home.Timeline.Content.14.Description: Starting with an interest in video games modding, I saw programming as the way to bring my most desirable visions into existence. Driven with enthusiasm, I decided to dedicate myself to learning Lua's rudimentaries.
Home.Timeline.Content.17.1.Description: Arguably, my best purchase. I still remember spending the whole night just waiting for Windows to install.
Home.Timeline.Content.17.2: Experimented with embedded systems and C/C++
Home.Timeline.Content.17.2.Description: Single-handedly, one of the most significant decisions of my career. Through countless short-circuit and over-voltage MCUs, I've learned to appreciate the engineers behind every piece of electronic.
Home.Timeline.Content.17.3: Crossed the bridge into the Internet of Things (ESP32 and ESP8266)
Home.Timeline.Content.17.3.Description: With the basic understanding of C/C++ with Arduino, Espressif's IoT Development Framework (ESP-IDF) was my next leap forward.
Home.Timeline.Content.18.1: Learned the elementaries of Web 2.0 (static HTML and CSS)
Home.Timeline.Content.18.1.Description: My first stepping stones into web development.
Home.Timeline.Content.18.2: Uncovered the capabilities of PHP and jQuery
Home.Timeline.Content.18.2.Description: This is a pivotal turning point in my outlook on web applications.
Home.Timeline.Content.18.3: Made my first RESTful API and MariaDB database
Home.Timeline.Content.18.4: Understood the fundamentals of salting and hashing
Home.Timeline.Content.18.4.Description: Despite never paying much attention to security and cryptography, this has taught me the significance of salting and hashing credentials as a foundational last line of defense.
Home.Timeline.Content.19: Discovered the world of Node.js and JavaScript frameworks
Home.Timeline.Content.19.Description: Eager to improve my application's productivity, speed, and scalability, I was recommended by many to try out Node.js and the diverse world of JavaScript frameworks.
Home.Timeline.Content.20.1.Description: With the recent spike in Progressive Web Applications' (PWAs) popularity and the abundance of free-time during pandemic, I figured that React and React Native were the most logical next steps.
Home.Timeline.Content.20.2.Description: Fascinated by Next.js's flexibility and performance, I was eager to learn more and equip it to my toolbox.
Home.Timeline.Content.21.1: Started the Bachelor's Programme in International Business at Aalto University
Home.Timeline.Content.21.1.Description: Starting a Bachelor's Degree in International Business has given me countless opportunities to be exposed to different cultures and meet people from different backgrounds, improving myself in ways I didn't expect.
Home.Timeline.Content.21.2: Experimented with OpenCV and the field of Computer Vision
Home.Timeline.Content.21.3.Description: A community for those interested in science, technology, and digital art to meet, spend time together, and work on either personal or collaborative hobbies.
Home.Timeline.Content.22: Started working on building my portfolio
Home.Timeline.Content.22.Description: As spring break began, I figured it might be a great opportunity to look back and reflect upon what I've learned throughout the years.
Home.Social.Title: Other platforms
Works.Web.Title: Web applications
Works.Web.Ambersbakery.Description: A online bakery with robust orders, products, and HR management system.
Works.Web.Stickynote.Description: Lightweight, cross-platform, and synchronous texts sharing web application.
Works.Web.Cronus.Description: A bot for managing and monitoring 3D printers.
Works.Web.khanhsportfolio.Description: Responsive, localized, and statically generated web application.
Works.Assignment.ProjectMikkeli.Descript: A compilation of interesting spots and places during my studies in Mikkeli.

404.Description: The page you're looking for was not found.
